sentences.en: A conservation is a statement of constancy in nature - in particular, constancy during change.
sentences.cn: 守恒定律说明自然界的不变性,特别是说明变化期间的不变性.

sentences.en: Climate reflects a basic struggle between constancy and change.
sentences.cn: 气候反映出稳定与变化之间基本的较量。

sentences.en: Constancy in love is a good thing.
sentences.cn: 爱情能持之以恒才是好事.

sentences.en: Cubes , squares or dice - Constancy, wisdom, verity probity, and equity.
sentences.cn: 立方体 、 方形、骰子 - 坚毅 、 学问 、 耿直和公正.

sentences.en: Deeply he respected her for her constancy.
sentences.cn: 他深深敬仰她的坚贞如一.

sentences.en: Early mariners relied on the constancy of the trade winds.
sentences.cn: 早期的水手出海依赖稳定的信风.

sentences.en: He admired her courage and constancy.
sentences.cn: 他钦佩她的勇气和忠贞。

sentences.en: Lozenge - Honesty and constancy, also held to be a token of noble birth.
sentences.cn: 菱形 - 实和坚定, 这也被认为是他作为贵族而与生俱来的天赋.

sentences.en: The constancy of the speed of light seems, at first thought, unremarkable.
sentences.cn: 光速恒定, 初看起来好像很平常.

sentences.en: The method relies on the constancy of masses and of the length of the wire.
sentences.cn: 这种方法依赖于悬重和弦长的恒定性.

sentences.en: The pine is a badge of constancy.
The Secret of Success is the Constancy of Purpose.
sentences.cn: 成功的秘诀在于目标始终如一.

sentences.en: This depends on their constancy throughout many allied groups.
sentences.cn: 这取决于它们在许多近缘类群中的稳定性.

sentences.en: Through love the universe with constancy makes changes all without discord.
sentences.cn: 通过爱,永恒的宇宙无一例外地改变了一切.

sentences.en: We live in a world without constancy.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在一个不断变化的世界。

phrases.tran_cn: 色彩恒常性；色感一致性

trans.tran_cn: 不屈不挠，坚定不移，恒久不变的状态或性质，持续性，稳定性，持久性
trans.tran_en: the quality of staying the same even though other things change
